flawed_nl_solution:
Ryan read an average of 300 pages a day because 2100 / 7 = <<2100/7=300>>300
He read 1000 more pages a day on average than his brother because 300 - 200 = <<300-200=1000>>1000
#### 1000

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 100, not 1000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
